name: Traffic Slice
desc: 4-player Unity multiplayer game where players control traffic lights at intersections to prevent car collisions.

name: The Censor Man
desc: Narrative Unity game (thesis project) exploring censorship, where players decide whether the world should know the truth.

name: Zelda Run Cycle
desc: A run cycle of Zelda character.

name: Wrapper FMOD
desc: A lightweight wrapper around FMOD Studio API for managing sound loading, playback, and channels in a clean and flexible way.

name: VamPop!
desc: A Pang-like game made with Unity6 for Android.

name: ACoopGame
desc: A 2-player coop puzzle game, applying 3D development and programming skills while collaborating with a team to design engaging gameplay experiences.

name: Arkanoid DX11
desc: A clone of the classic Arkanoid game, developed in C++ and DirectX 11.
